name: Brütle Dungeon v0.1
description: Use skill, speed, and tons of randomized disposable handguns to blast your way through insane hordes of goblins, ghosts, and flying boosk heads! Destroy all enemies in your path to get through the portal, then see if you can survive! Take down epic bosses, traverse increasingly hostile arenas, and avoid deadly booby traps as you strive for the ultimate BRÜTLE HIGHSCORE!
